title: Lil Nas X Is Not Trying To Comfort Anyone
description: Every generation has its musical "boogeyman." The Rolling Stones, N.W.A., Madonna. And the latest musician to be inducted into this notorious list is Lil Nas X. Not only has he broken Billboard records, he's breaking barriers.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Lil Nas X Is Not Trying To Comfort Anyone
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: "My intention was always to be as entertaining as possible," says Lil Nas X. "I'm not like trying to comfort anyone, or their children."
itunes:subtitle: "My intention was always to be as entertaining as possible," says Lil Nas X. "I'm not like trying to comfort anyone, or their children."
